QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.id odf_pk, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.code as code, odf_parent_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_parent_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.agl_ordinal as agl_ordinal, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.agl_port_item_type as agl_port_item_type, (select audit_tmplt_created.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_created where audit_tmplt_created.user_id = odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.created_by) as created_by, odf_parent_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, (select audit_tmplt_updated.full_name from (select full_name, user_id from srm_resources) audit_tmplt_updated where audit_tmplt_updated.user_id = odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.last_updated_by) as updated_by, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.name as name, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.odf_parent_id as odf_parent_id, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.partition_code as partition_code, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.agl_is_included as agl_is_included, odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.odf_cncrt_parent_id as odf_cncrt_parent_id, odf_parent_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from odf_ca_agl_port_item_type odf_ca_agl_port_item_type JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, nmc_integrations.id odf_pk, odf_ca_integration.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_integration.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_integration.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_integration.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from nmc_integrations nmc_integrations, odf_ca_integration odf_ca_integration where 1 = 1 and nmc_integrations.id = odf_ca_integration.id) odf_parent_id ON odf_parent_id.odf_pk=odf_ca_agl_port_item_type.odf_parent_id where 1 = 1
